snippet: LEAD: Federal disaster relief officials said today that they were finding what they called eerie similarities between the earthquake on Tuesday and the scenario they enacted in a major drill just over two months ago....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: Federal disaster relief officials said today that they were finding what they called eerie similarities between the earthquake on Tuesday and the scenario they enacted in a major drill just over two months ago.

headline.main: Rescuers Find Parallels To Recent Disaster Drill

byline.original: By SETH MYDANS, Special to The New York Times
